meanings.definition: A Mexican dish consisting of tortilla chips topped with melted cheese and often seasoned with various toppings.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat nachos with cheese and salsa.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone enjoyed the nachos with extra jalapenos.
meanings.sent3: The nacho was so cheesy, it made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled over like a pot of bubbling nacho cheese.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the nachos filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A single tortilla chip used in nachos.
meanings.sent1: I dipped the nacho in the salsa before taking a bite.
meanings.sent2: The nacho broke in half as I tried to scoop up the guacamole.
meanings.sent3: The lonely nacho sat at the edge of the plate, waiting to be eaten.
meanings.sent4: Her idea was as crisp and satisfying as a perfectly toasted nacho chip.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the nacho echoed in the quiet room.
